meanings.definition: To suffer or die from lack of food
meanings.sent1: The poor dog starves when no one feeds it.
meanings.sent2: If you don't eat, your body starves and becomes weak.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly said, 'My phone starves for battery power.'
meanings.sent4: Her passion for music starves without regular practice.
meanings.sent5: The plant starves for sunlight in the dark corner of the room.

meanings.definition: To suffer extreme hunger or deprivation
meanings.sent1: During the famine, many people starve due to lack of food.
meanings.sent2: She felt like she would starve if she didn't eat soon.
meanings.sent3: The kids playfully complained, 'Our pet fish starves for attention.'
meanings.sent4: His curiosity starves for new knowledge and experiences.
meanings.sent5: The explorer's thirst for adventure starves in the mundane routine of daily life.

meanings.sent1: The malicious witch starves her prisoners to weaken them.
meanings.sent2: The toxic environment starves the plants of essential nutrients.
meanings.sent3: The strict diet plan starves you of your favorite treats.
meanings.sent4: His toxic behavior starves their relationship of love and trust.
meanings.sent5: The harsh winter weather starves the soil of moisture, affecting crop growth.
